analysis.description: Helper.stringToBytes32 (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#337-354) is declared view but contains assembly code

Helper.isGoldenMin (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#462-471) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _min == 8
_reward in Reward.mintRewardCore (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#174) is a local variable never initialiazed

Reentrancy in Reward.claim (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#120-139):
	External calls:
	- claimAmount = lotteryContract.sBountyClaim(_sender) (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#126-130)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pReward (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#130-139)
	- pRewardedSum (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#130-139)
	- pRewardedSumPerRound (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#130-139)
	- rRewardedSum (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#130-139)
	- rewardList (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#130-139)
	- rewardedSum (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#130-139)

Helper.getNewEndTime (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#408-430) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeout > TIMEOUT1 (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#420-421)
	- _slideEndTime > fixedEndTime (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#427-430)

Helper.isGoldenMin (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#462-471) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _min == 8 (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#470-471)
	- _restTime1 > 21600 (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#467-468)

Helper.stringToBytes32 uses assembly (/unique_chucks/8/0x8888887528e6e639d08b9809de139021789b1689.sol#337-354)
